menu.name: Grilled Cajun Style Chicken Breast
menu.description: Full of bold flavours, this Cajun grilled chicken is marinated in a homemade Cajun seasoning and then grilled to perfection.

menu.name: New England Clam Chowder
menu.description: This cravilicious white creamy clam chowder is bursting with delectable clams, tender potatoes, and salty bacon.
